short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance Your Reddit Browsing Experience with Code Syntax Highlighting!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform the way you view and interact with code on Reddit with this Chrome extension, specifically designed to elevate your browsing experience by integrating syntax highlighting. Perfect for developers, programmers, and tech enthusiasts, this extension intelligently applies syntax highlighting to code snippets on Reddit, making them more readable, visually appealing, and easier to understand.

Key Features:

Automatic Detection and Highlighting: Automatically detects code blocks and applies syntax highlighting without any manual intervention.

Wide Range of Languages Supported: Supports a diverse array of programming languages, ensuring that whether you're looking at Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, CPP, and many more! 

Customizable Themes: Choose from multiple highlighting themes to customize the appearance of code blocks according to your preference and comfort.
